channel.title: Rebirth - Possibly The Most Advanced 667! [Dev Log]
channel.description:
[img]http://i40.tinypic.com/2ugkoe8.png[/img]
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode]Hello, welcome to the offical development thread of Rebirth 667! Before I continue, please do not flam/spam this thread and take time reading it please! [b]Thank you![/b] Base: PvPScapez[/font]
[b]-Main Goals[/b] To make a stable economy rsps, with many players! To get many, many players! To make the most advanced and unique 667 rsps!
[b][Current Server Features][/b] [i]Remeber these features will be update upon updates.[/i]
-95% complete combat -100% special attack on weapons -lots of shops -unique ability to change login background -lots of account security -custom items (e.g., a donator item, special attack weapon 3x spec, etc) -skilling [65% complete] -titles (e.g., Donator titles, Owner titles, etc -A Control Panel - mod, admin, players -Many ranks -Grand Exchange, currently working on Sell! -Custom Starter Dialogue [b][i]*Dungeoneering*[/i][/b] All item for dung work (50% complete) Dung shops (85% complete)
[b][i][Home][/i][/b] [img]http://img593.imageshack.us/img593/1741/8x7.png[/img]
[b][i]Current Client Background, Maybe going to be changed[/i][/b] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/2bco05.png[/img]
[b]Development Log[/b]
[code=java]June 23rd - Changed the home June 23rd - Added combat flask June 23rd - Changed Client background June 22rd - Started Magic Combat June 22rd - Added all of the runes neccessary June 22rd - Mage Shop June 22rd - Custom Magic Dialogue June 22rd - Added a custom magic tab, interface (unique)[/code]
[i][b]Current Combat Features[/b][/i] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/2ij0ok6.png[/img]
[i]Tell me what you would like to see, please postive comments![/i]
[b]This development thread will be updated, yes I know the dev thread is small but i'll keep adding the most unique and best content updates![/b] Thanks for reading! 350 updates = beta release 450 updates = release!

item.title: Rebirth - Possibly The Most Advanced 667! [Dev Log]
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

If I skipped over it please point it out to me, but what does “lots of account security” mean, and what sort of request system are you planning on implementing?

Read full topic

item.title: Rebirth - Possibly The Most Advanced 667! [Dev Log]
item.dc:creator: @Morpheus1 Morpheus-
item.description:
@Morpheus1 wrote:

2ugkoe8.png792×257

[font=Lucida Sans Unicode]Hello, welcome to the offical development thread of Rebirth 667! Before I continue, please do not flam/spam this thread and take time reading it please! Thank you! Base: PvPScapez[/font]

-Main Goals
To make a stable economy rsps, with many players!
To get many, many players!
To make the most advanced and unique 667 rsps!

[Current Server Features]
Remeber these features will be update upon updates.

-95% complete combat
-100% special attack on weapons
-lots of shops
-unique ability to change login background
-lots of account security
-custom items (e.g., a donator item, special attack weapon 3x spec, etc)
-skilling [65% complete]
-titles (e.g., Donator titles, Owner titles, etc
-A Control Panel - mod, admin, players
-Many ranks
-Grand Exchange, currently working on Sell!
-Custom Starter Dialogue
Dungeoneering
All item for dung work (50% complete)
Dung shops (85% complete)

[Home]

Current Client Background, Maybe going to be changed

2bco05.png639×691

Development Log

June 23rd - Changed the home June 23rd - Added combat flask June 23rd - Changed Client background June 22rd - Started Magic Combat June 22rd - Added all of the runes neccessary June 22rd - Mage Shop June 22rd - Custom Magic Dialogue June 22rd - Added a custom magic tab, interface (unique)

Current Combat Features

2ij0ok6.png600×1600

Tell me what you would like to see, please postive comments!

This development thread will be updated, yes I know the dev thread is small but i’ll keep adding the most unique and best content updates!
Thanks for reading!
350 updates = beta release 450 updates = release!

Read full topic
